name: Gathering Sky
description: Guide a flock of birds on a playful journey across the sky.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card or integrated graphics chip with OpenGL 3.0 support Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Short, Beautiful, relaxing, scary, captivating, sad, and redeeming, this game is more than what people ask for, they don't ask for it aloud. 20/10, one of the best games of the year. Though I do wish they still had the old soundtrack!
This game is so relaxing. I'm mostly enjoy it. The music is so relaxing and calm. If you want a game that is relaxing and calm, this game is for you.

This is a lovely little game for what it is. It's a little more than a movie, a little less than a game: you guide your a growing flock of birds. That said, I DID feel a soaring sense of exhilaration at some point, and panic for my flock at other points. The soundtrack is beautiful. If you enjoyed the film 'Winged Migration', you would enjoy the game, 'Gathering Sky' captures the magic of birdflight, or watching birds fly. Don't expect an adrenaline rush as if you were playing 'Call of Duty': this is the opposite, the perfect game for passing time when you just want to be able to relax.
